Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards hit a go-ahead 7-foot floater with 25.7 seconds left
Rudy Gobert iced the game with two free throws
Nikola Jokic had 26 points, 13 assists and nine rebounds and hit two free throws with 2:30 left to put Denver up 116-109
Gordon led the Nuggets with 31 points and 11 rebounds
The benches cleared, shouts were exchanged, and both players got a technical
Post-Match Reflections: Minnesota Timberwolves recovered from a 25-3 fourth-quarter run by the Nuggets
The Timberwolves led the league in defense last season, but have sprung some leaks, particularly in transition
Miscellaneous Highlights: Michael Porter Jr. added 26 points for the Nuggets
Jamal Murray to the concussion protocol in the third quarter after colliding with Randle
The Nuggets were outscored 31-13 by the Timberwolves' bench
